Configuring Time of Day Access

To further protect your network, you can restrict access to it by specifying when users can access the network.

To configure Time of Day Access:

 1. In the Wireless Table (Wireless > Basic Settings), check the box for the network you want to configure.

 2. Click Time of Day Access. The Time of Day Access page appears.

 3. In the Active Time field, check Enable to enable Time of Day Access.

 4. In the Start Time and Stop Time fields, specify the time during the day, when access to the network is allowed.

 5. Click Save.
